scripts.dev: npm install && npm run build-dev && npm run server-dev
scripts.pre-prod: npm install && npm run build-pre-prod && npm run server-pre-prod
scripts.prod: npm install && npm run build-prod && npm run server-prod
scripts.server-dev: npm run server-stop && NODE_ENV=development forever start -o ./server/server.log -e ./server/server.log ./server/server-babel.js && NODE_ENV=development node ./webpack/webpack-server
